CHAT.comment: KEN L. SALAZAR, SECRETARY OF THE INTERIOR, ET AL., Petitioners v. FRANK BUONO.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GEN. ELENA KAGAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PETER J. ELIASBERG ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF GEN. ELENA KAGAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:06 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
